document.full_text: alex burrows scored his second goal 5:22 into overtime, helping the vancouver canucks avoid a historic playoff collapse by eliminating the defending champion chicago blackhawks.
document.title: canucks 2, blackhawks 1 (ot): burrows lifts canucks into next round with overtime goal
lines_and_colors: alex burrows scored his second goal 5:22 into overtime, helping the vancouver canucks avoid a historic playoff collapse by eliminating the defending champion chicago blackhawks.
